name: Rise and Be Recognized
tooltip:
Rise and Be Recognized

<Warmaster Laggrond salutes you.>

It is your time, <name>. You have done much for the Frostwolf Clan and in doing so, earned a place as not only a soldier of Frostwolf but also as a friend.

Well done! Present your initiate's insignia.

Requirements:
- Frostwolf Insignia Rank 1
